blogPost.excerpt: Upskill in data science by working on projects co-created with tech companies. Remote learning at your pace, supervised by industry experts. Build a portfolio and be work-ready on day one! Pay when employed with an Income Share Agreement (ISA).
blogPost.body: Upskill in data science by working on projects co-created with tech companies. Remote learning at your pace, supervised by industry experts. Build a portfolio and be work-ready on day one! Pay when employed with an Income Share Agreement (ISA).
blogPost.title: Turing College - Data science career school co-created with tech companies
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 通过与科技公司共同创建的项目来提升数据科学方面的技能。在行业专家的监督下，按照自己的节奏进行远程学习。建立一个投资组合，并在第一天就做好工作准备。受雇时支付与收入分享协议（ISA）。
localize.tagline: 与科技公司共同创建的数据科学职业学校

localize.description: 通過與科技公司共同創建的項目來提升數據科學方面的技能。在行業專家的監督下，按照自己的節奏進行遠程學習。建立一個投資組合，並在第一天就做好工作準備。受僱時支付與收入分享協議（ISA）。
localize.tagline: 與科技公司共同創建的數據科學職業學校

previous.excerpt: The mission of NFThub was (when I started it nearly a year ago) to streamling the day to say lives of people working full time in the #NFT industry. With all of the recent attention on #NFTs the vision has expanded, but remains commnuity centric, and free.
previous.title: NFThub - A landing pad to navigate the NFT metaverse

localize.description: NFThub的使命是（当我在近一年前创办它时）精简在#NFT行业全职工作的人的日常说生活。随着最近对#NFTs的关注，视野已经扩大，但仍然以社区为中心，并且是免费的。
localize.tagline: 为NFT元宇宙导航的着陆台。

localize.description: NFThub的使命是（當我在近一年前創辦它時）精簡在#NFT行業全職工作的人的日常說生活。隨着最近對#NFTs的關注，視野已經擴大，但仍然以社區爲中心，並且是免費的。
localize.tagline: 爲NFT元宇宙導航的着陸臺。

next.excerpt: Terminhack lets you pretend to be a hacker running real penetration testing tools. You can run it directly from the website or from your terminal!
next.title: Terminhack - Impress your friends by pretending to be a real hacker 👨‍💻

localize.description: Terminhack让你假装是一个黑客运行真正的渗透测试工具。你可以直接从网站或从你的终端上运行它!
localize.tagline: 假装是一个真正的黑客，给你的朋友留下深刻印象👨💻。

localize.description: Terminhack讓你假裝是一個黑客運行真正的滲透測試工具。你可以直接從網站或從你的終端上運行它!
localize.tagline: 假裝是一個真正的黑客，給你的朋友留下深刻印象👨💻。
